document.full_text: nearly 2,000 mongolian students marched on a government building in the city of xilinhot in inner mongolia province to demand that chinese officials respect the rights of mongolian herders.
document.title: asia: china: mongolian students protest handling of death
lines_and_colors: nearly 2,000 mongolian students marched on a government building in the city of xilinhot in inner mongolia province to demand that chinese officials respect the rights of mongolian herders.
